statements: SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT plant_name, emission_value FROM emissions_data WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_category = 'CO2';
SELECT AVG(emission_value) AS avg_emission FROM emissions_data WHERE country = 'Germany';
SELECT plant_name, emission_value FROM emissions_data WHERE country = 'China' LIMIT 10;
SELECT plant_name, city, emission_value FROM emissions_data WHERE plant_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE country = 'USA' AND emission_category = 'CO2' ORDER BY emission_value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_category = 'NO2' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT city, SUM(emission_value) AS total_emissions FROM emissions_data GROUP BY city HAVING total_emissions > 1000 ORDER BY total_emissions DESC
SELECT MAX(emission_value), MIN(emission_value), AVG(emission_value) FROM emissions_data WHERE country = 'China'
SELECT * FROM EmissionsData;
SELECT plant_id, emission_type, emission_value FROM EmissionsData;
SELECT plant_id, emission_type, emission_value FROM EmissionsData WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT plant_name, plant_location FROM Plants;
SELECT plant_name, plant_owner FROM Plants WHERE plant_location = 'California';
SELECT plant_id, emission_type, emission_value, emission_date FROM EmissionsData WHERE plant_id = 1 ORDER BY emission_date DESC;
SELECT plant_name, emission_type, plant_owner FROM Plants WHERE plant_location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmissionsData WHERE emission_value > 100 ORDER BY plant_id, emission_date DESC;
SELECT plant_name, AVG(emission_value) as average_emission FROM Plants JOIN EmissionsData ON Plants.plant_id = EmissionsData.plant_id GROUP BY plant_name;

SELECT plant_id, emission_type, emission_value, plant_name, plant_location FROM EmissionsData JOIN Plants ON EmissionsData.plant_id = Plants.plant_id WHERE emission_value < 50 ORDER BY plant_id, emission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM industrial_plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM industrial_plants ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT plant_name, emission_type, emission_value FROM industrial_plants WHERE emission_value > 100.0;
SELECT plant_name, location, emission_type FROM industrial_plants WHERE location LIKE 'C%';
SELECT * FROM plant_statistics WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY emission_total DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM industrial_plants;
SELECT * FROM industrial_plants ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM industrial_plants WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT i.plant_name, e.trend_date, e.trend_value FROM industrial_plants i JOIN emission_trends e ON i.plant_id = e.plant_id;
SELECT i.plant_name, s.year, s.emission_total FROM industrial_plants i JOIN plant_statistics s ON i.plant_id = s.plant_id WHERE s.year > 2020 ORDER BY s.year DESC;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data;
SELECT plant_id, emission_type, emission_value FROM emissions_data WHERE measured_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT plant_name, plant_location FROM plants ORDER BY plant_location DESC;
SELECT plant_id, SUM(emission_value) AS total_emissions FROM emissions_data GROUP BY plant_id;
SELECT * FROM data_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor' ORDER BY calibration_date ASC;
SELECT plant_id, emission_type, emission_value, measured_date FROM emissions_data WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT plant_name, plant_location, industry_type FROM plants WHERE plant_location = 'California';
SELECT plant_id, sensor_type, calibration_date FROM data_sensors ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, contact_email FROM plant_owners WHERE owner_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT plant_name, industry_type, emission_type, emission_value FROM plants p JOIN emissions_data e ON p.plant_id = e.plant_id ORDER BY emission_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM industrial_plants;
SELECT plant_name, location, emissions FROM industrial_plants;
SELECT plant_id, COUNT(*) FROM emissions_records GROUP BY plant_id;
SELECT plant_name, position FROM plant_employees WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(emission_value) AS highest_emission FROM emissions_records;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM industrial_plants LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM emissions_records WHERE emission_value > 100 ORDER BY emission_date DESC
SELECT industry_type, COUNT(*) AS total_plants FROM industry_types JOIN industrial_plants ON industry_types.type_id = industrial_plants.plant_id GROUP BY industry_type
SELECT employee_name, position FROM plant_employees WHERE plant_id = 3
SELECT plant_name, emissions, capacity FROM industrial_plants JOIN plant_capacity ON industrial_plants.plant_id = plant_capacity.plant_id WHERE capacity > 1000
